programme.title: ehh, uhhuduur
programme.desc: Inkade impeeriumi au ja kuulsus ning selle jäljed täna. Machu Picchu jääb teisele poole mäge. Pikale veninud lõunapaus toob puhta ihu, mis meelitab ligi ootamatud külalised. Mäed murravad, ookean toob leevendust. Lõpetuseks puhast kunsti. Režissöör Wend, operaator Liivo Niglas, tootja MTÜ Filmiklubi MP Doc.

programme.title: Sinu kätes
programme.desc: Elisa vanema õe saabumine haiglasse muudab noore residendi arusaamatul moel veelgi tõredamaks. Andrea jätkab amneesia kustutatud aastates sobramist, Agnese aga ei suuda varjata armukadedust, mida Giulia ja Andrea järjest soojemad suhted temas tekitavad.

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: "Plekktrummi" stuudios süttivad tuled, et jätkata vestlusi inimestega, kes on ennast pühendanud kultuuri kujundamisele ja mõtestamisele. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma.

programme.title: Keskea rõõmud
programme.desc: Ühel 1986. aasta suvepäeval asuvad Tallinnast Lõuna-Eestisse imearst Niguli juurde teele kaks abielupaari ja üks nendega kaasa sõitev naine. Kogu viisiku sõidu eesmärgiks paistab olevat leida rohtu oma liiva niriseva elu parandamiseks, leida midagi, mis laseks neil olla (jälle) õnnelikud. Ühisel teekonnal õpivad nad rohkem tundma nii iseennast kui ka üksteist. Ei lähe kuigi kaua aega, kui küünikust Tõnu ja heitliku meelega Hubert omavahel käsipidi kokku lähevad. Ja siis jälle lepivad. Abielulised kõrvalehüpped, kogu Eestit läbiv teekond imearsti juurde ja suvised unistused ei jää nende tegelaste nooremapoolse keskea ainsateks rõõmudeks. Lembit Ulfsaki esimene mängufilmilavastus tabab väga hästi kaasaegseid eesti karaktereid. Valentin Kuik kirjutas oma stsenaariumi just filmi näitlejaid silmas pidades. Heas mõttes realistlik ja kerge lähenemine tegelastele ning käsitletavatele teemadele on pikendanud selle road movie eluiga üle keskmise. Tänapäeval kuulub "Keskea rõõmud" auga Eesti (tragi-) komöödiafilmide klassikapaketti. Režissöör Lembit Ulfsak, stsenarist Valentin Kuik Andrei Dmitrijevi osavõtul, operaator Nikolai Šarubin, helioperaator Jaak Elling, kunstnik Priit Vaher, helilooja Tõnu Aare, monteerijad Marju Juhkum, Ingrid Laos, toimetaja Tiina Lokk, filmi direktor Anne Alla. Peaosades Tõnu Kark (Tõnu Loorits), Maria Klenskaja (Pille Loorits), Kaie Mihkleson (Helena), Ülle Kaljuste (Silva Raud), Lembit Ulfsak (Hubert Raud), teistes osades Heino Mandri, Arvo Kukumägi, Hendrik Toompere, Leida Sibul, Enn Kraam, Vello Janson jt.

programme.title: Koguperekontsert "Mina ka
programme.desc: Kas mäletad lugu kuningast, kes istus kuningamaal oma trooni peal, suvelaulude vaieldamatut hitti sellest, kui karvamütsiaeg oli ammuilma otsa lõppenud või kuidas O on ümmargune ja K on kandiline? Nii need kui ka mitmed teised popid lastelaulud kõlavad nüüd uues, hoogsas ja rütmikas kuues. "Mina ka" on koguperekontsert, mis pakub rõõmu igas vanuses publikule - lapsepõlvelaulude äratundmisrõõmu emadele ja isadele ning lahedaid leide nii tirtsudele, põnnidele kui ka poistele ja tüdrukutele. Laval astuvad üles Kristel Aaslaid, Birgit, Liis Lemsalu, Ivo Linna, Daniel Levi, Ott Lepland ja Liisi Koikson, Lasteekraani Muusikastuudio laululapsed jpt. Lauljaid saadab ansambel "Swingers" koosseisus Mihkel Mattisen klaveril, Indrek Sarrap bassil, Timo Vendt saksofonil ja viiulil ning Peep Kallas trummidel. Telesalvestuse režissöör on Kertu Köösel, juhtoperaator Andrus Rebane, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske.

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Kapten Kambakas ja Suur Fuuraks kehastuvad piraatideks ning ründavad krabide randa, röövides sealt hulga koralle. Gilberti juhtimisel nuputavad Džungliässad välja kavala plaani, kuidas kurikaelad peatada.

programme.title: Iluuisutamise juunioride MM Tallinnas
programme.desc: Jäätantsu veab Eestis treener Lea Rand, kelle pojad Kristjan ja Taavi sõitsid oma partneritega välja meie paaride parimad tulemused tiitlivõistlustel. Kristjan õppis sportlaskarjääri järel hambaarstiks, Taavi tegutseb koreograafina ja aitab seekordset tiitlivõistlust ka läbi viia. Eestit esindavad kodusel suurvõistlusel 17-aastased Tatjana Bunina ja Ivan Kuznetsov, keda Tallinnas juhendab ikka Lea Rand. Rütmitantsu 20 paremat paari pääsevad edasi vabatantsule. Otseülekande režissöör on Margit Rand, reporter Aet Süvari ning kommentaatorid Anu Säärits ja Liina-Grete Lilender.

programme.title: Muumioru lood
programme.desc: Muumitroll astub vastu oma seni raskeimale katsumusele, kui ta talveunest liiga vara üles ärkab ja leiab end üksinda Muumioru talve võõras maailmas. Kuid kohtumine oma iidse sugulase, Esivanemaga, õpetab talle, kuidas ellujäämiseks oma ürgset poolt kasutada.

programme.title: Sisenemine keelatud
programme.desc: Lolo pere valmistub jõuludeks ja perepea on võtnud nõuks kõik naabrid jõulukaunistustega üle trumbata. Häda sellele, kes pole õiges jõulumeeleolus!

programme.title: Äkki õnnestub
A vdrug polutšitsa
programme.desc: Lustakas lugu nelja sõbra - jutuka Pärdiku, tagasihoidliku Elevandipoja, ekstsentrilise Papagoi ja mõtliku Boa ettevõtmistest koduses džunglis, kus tihtilugu tuleb lahendada naljakaid paradokse, mis on seotud mitmetähenduslike sõnamängudega.

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Tänases saates uurivad arstid viiruste olemust ja osalevad järjekordses viktoriinis! Näeme, keda tabab tatilaadung, kohtume julgete ai-auhindade nominentidega. Lisaks muudetakse Xand hiiglaslikuks rakuks!

programme.title: Osooni lood
Salapärane viiger
programme.desc: Viiger ehk viigerhüljes võib olla põhjuseks, miks inimesed üldse Läänemere ääres paikseks jäid. Looma liha kõlbas toiduks, nahk kehakatteks, rasv kütteks. Hülgeuurija Ivar Jüssi annab lihtsa nõuande, kuidas vahet teha viigril ja hallhülgel: viiger on kassi nägu, hallhüljes aga koera või hobuse nägu. Arktilise päritolu tõttu on viiger väga kliimatundlik - soojad talved ja jää puudumine mõjub nende sigimisele hukutavalt. Viigrid on väga ettevaatlikud, Hiiumaa laiud on parim koht, kus neid kohata võib. Autor Sander Loite.

programme.title: Iluuisutamise juunioride MM Tallinnas
programme.desc: Mullu jäi juunioride MM pandeemia tõttu Hiinas ära ja tänavu pidi tiitlivõistlus toimuma Bulgaarias. Erinevatel põhjustel Sofia korraldusest loobus ja märtsi alguses võttis võõrustaja koorma endale Eesti Uisuliit. Esimesed medalid jagatakse Tondiraba jäähallis välja paarissõidus, kus favoriitideks Gruusia esinumbrid Karina Safina ja Luka Berulava, kes olid olümpiamängudel üheksandad. Eesti parim tulemus kuulub sel alal Maria Sergejeva ja Ilja Glebovile, kes said 2008. aasta juunioride MM-il kuuenda koha. Otseülekande režissöör on Margit Rand ning kommentaatorid Anu Säärits ja Liina-Grete Lilender.

programme.title: Salapärased saared Vaikses ookeanis
programme.desc: Maailmas on järel veel vaid mõned üksikud hõimud, kel on õnnestunud end pikki aastaid välisilma eest peita. Ühed vähesed arhailise elustiiliga säilinud hõimud elavad veel Paapua Uus-Guineas ja Vanuatul. Vaikse ookeani saarestikes seiklesid Tiina Jokinen ja Peeter Vähi. Tootja Osakond OÜ.

programme.title: Muusikaparadiis. Hortus Musicus
programme.desc: Kuidas vanamuusikaga publikut köita ja olla endiselt armastatud ning kuulus, räägime Andres Mustoneni ja tema 50-aastaseks saanud ansambliga Hortus Musicus. Režissöör Erle Veber, helirežissöör Kaspar Karner, juhtoperaator Meelis Kadastik, produtsendid Karmel Killandi ja Ruth Alaküla.

programme.title: Filmiklubi
programme.desc: Kinoklassika filmi "Farinelli" juhatab sisse Alvar Tiisler.

programme.title: Farinelli
programme.desc: R: Gérard Corbiau. O: Stéfano Dionisi, Enrico Lo Verso. Teatraalse draama keskmes on 18. sajandi kuulsa Itaalia kastraatlaulja Carlo Broschi, tuntud ka kui Farinelli, elu ja karjäär. Film algab nooruses kastreeritud inglihäälega Farinelli saabumisega Hispaania kuninga õukonda, kus ta veetis koos oma andetu heliloojast venna Riccardoga enam kui kakskümmend aastat. Koos vallutasid nad nii lavasid kui ka naiste südameid. Intriigidest pulbitsevas õukonnas ei leia õnne aga kumbki vendadest. Belgia lavastaja Gérard Corbiau suurejooneline film kujutab ühe andeka looja traagikat baroksel ajastul. Filmis kõlavaid Farinelli aariaid laulavad kontratenor Derek Lee ja sopran Ewe Mallas Godlewski. Et vajaliku hääleulatusega lauljat võtta ei olnud, sulandati digitaaltehnika abil nende hääled üheks. Linateos võitis Kuldgloobuse ja kandideeris parima võõrkeelse filmi Oscarile.(n)

programme.title: Oh! Mammy Blue
programme.desc: R: Antonio Hens. Komöödia. Laura (Carmen Maura) oli kunagi legendaarne Hispaania rokklaulja, siis läks tema karjäär aga allamäge ja nüüd elab vanadaam vaikses rütmis tiksuvas hooldekodus. Elurõõm pole Laurat siiski maha jätnud ja kaaslaste tujutõstmiseks otsustab ta hooldekodu eakate asukatega uuesti rokkansambli püsti panna. Hooldekodu juhataja jaoks on see aga ennekuulmatu ja ta tahab Laura rangelt raamidesse suruda. Ootamatult ilmub välja Laura lapselaps Jaime (Milton García), kellest Laural seni aimugi polnud. Lapselaps tahab saada rokkmuusikuks ja vanaema nõu on nüüd kallis.(n)

programme.title: Kui lammastest saavad lõvid
When Lambs Become Lions
programme.desc: Keenia valitsuse karmid looduskaitsemeetmed seavad ohtu ühe väikekaupmehe vandliäri. Kui tema poole pöördub rahalistesse raskustesse sattunud sugulane, kes töötab pargivahina, näevad mõlemad uut võimalust. Režissöör Jon Kasbe jälgis oma filmi tegelasi kolm aastat, mille tulemusena sündis mitmekülgne ja paeluv pilguheit kahte maailma, mis seisavad teineteisele lähemal, kui võiks arvata ning kus lõppkokkuvõttes käib võitlus ellujäämise eest.(n)

programme.title: Susapusa Okidos
programme.desc: Susapusa sokk on raske kapi all peidus ja ta ei tea, kuidas seda liigutada. Ka Zojal ja Feliksil on vaja rasket kasti sikutada. Sõbrad saavad teada, kuidas kasutada kange ja kaldpindu, et nihutada eest asju, mida nad muidu ei jaksa paigastki liigutada.(n)

programme.title: Susapusa Okidos
programme.desc: Mäehiiglane Mürakas on külmetunud ja tema aevastamine külvab Okido pisikutega üle. Mis on pisikud ja kuidas nad meie organismile mõjuvad? Miks on vaja pesta ja hoida oma kodu puhtana? Nendele küsimustele otsivad vastust Susapusa ja ta sõbrad ning nagu ikka tulevad appi Pimm, Pamm ja Pumm.(n)

programme.title: Rebased ja mägrad
programme.desc: Edmund ja Margaret lähevad seiklema ning ka lapsed otsustavad suurtele seiklustele vastu minna.(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Miia sõidab suveks vanaisa Renzo juurde tallu, kus kohtub paljude loomade ja ka nägusa abilise Marioga. Tsentoopias valitseb pealtnäha rahu, siis aga ilmub silmapiirile kummaline lendav saar ehk Rikseli rändtsirkus.(n)

programme.title: Äkki õnnestub
A vdrug polutšitsa
programme.desc: Lustakas lugu nelja sõbra - jutuka Pärdiku, tagasihoidliku Elevandipoja, ekstsentrilise Papagoi ja mõtliku Boa ettevõtmistest koduses džunglis, kus tihtilugu tuleb lahendada naljakaid paradokse, mis on seotud mitmetähenduslike sõnamängudega.(n)

programme.title: Tipptiivad
programme.desc: Penny sõbrale Saltyle ei meeldi rahvamassid, aga kui Penny oma vana paati päästes lõksu jääb, peab Salty Tipptiivad appi kutsuma!(n)

programme.title: Sisenemine keelatud
programme.desc: Lolo pere valmistub jõuludeks ja perepea on võtnud nõuks kõik naabrid jõulukaunistustega üle trumbata. Häda sellele, kes pole õiges jõulumeeleolus!(n)

programme.title: Jorinde ja Joringel
Jorinde und Joringel
programme.desc: Jorinde ja Joringel on teineteisesse armunud ning unistavad ühisest tulevikust. Jorinde isa arust on aga sulasepoiss Joringel päevavaras. Kui Jorinde isa keelab neil abielluda, otsustavad noored põgeneda. Loodetud õnn jääb üürikeseks: kuri nõid, kes on ära röövinud juba paljud tüdrukud, röövib ka Jorinde. Siiani pole kellelgi õnnestunud tungida nõia riiki. Joringel aga mõtleb välja plaani. Tal õnnestub üle kogu maa kardetud röövrüütel oskuslikult üle kavaldada ja varastada rüütlilt tema ohtlikuim relv - võlulill. Lille võlujõu abil tahab Joringel vabastada oma armastatu, kuid röövrüütel ei alistu nii lihtsalt. Koos oma kahe kannupoisiga asub ta varast jälitama. Nõid kasutab kõiki võimalusi, et Jorinde igaveseks oma kallimast lahutada. Samas teab nõid nii mõndagi röövrüütlist ja tema võlulillest.(n)

programme.title: Siilipoiss Alfredi salapärased seiklused
programme.desc: Ricardo on närvivapustuse äärel, kui temast tehtud skulptuur lõhutuna leitakse. Alfred hakkab otsima süüdlast, kuid jõuab hoopis ootamatu lahenduse jälile.(n)

programme.title: Heelium
programme.desc: Martini ja Petteri videol on meeletult vaatajaid ja nad kutsutakse televisiooni jutusaatesse. Willy kasutab juhust ja tutvustab seal isa leiutisi.(n)

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Tänases saates uurivad arstid viiruste olemust ja osalevad järjekordses viktoriinis! Näeme, keda tabab tatilaadung, kohtume julgete ai-auhindade nominentidega. Lisaks muudetakse Xand hiiglaslikuks rakuks!(n)

programme.title: Ozi võlumaa
programme.desc: Enamjagu Austraaliast asub vee all. Mereala on kaks korda suurem kui maismaamassiiv. Sarja teises osas püüame mõista, miks Austraalia rannik mereliike ligi tõmbab ja avastame, et kolm maad ümbritsevat ookeani – Lõuna-Jäämeri, Vaikne ja India ookean - moodustavad ainulaadse keskkonna igat masti ookeaniränduritele.(n)

programme.title: Selge pilt
programme.desc: Vanasõna ütleb, et kes palju teeb, see palju jõuab. Või et oma tööd peab armastama. Kuid kui seda kõike saab liiga palju, on oht läbi põleda. nagu juhtus noore neiu Kerttuga, kelle koolitööd ja hobid murdsid nii maha, et enesetapumõttedki polnud enam tema jaoks võõrad. Muusik Sandra Vabarnat tabas aga ühel hetkel selline vaimne ja füüsiline jõuetus, et ta lihtsalt ei suutnud enam voodist püsti tõusta. Isegi mitte selleks, et oma väikese lapse eest hoolitseda. Tema otsustas edaspidise läbipõlemise vältimiseks hakata oma aega põhjalikult planeerima, tehes täpsed plaanid puhkamiseks ja tööks. Kuid läbipõlemise ennetamiseks on teisigi võimalusi ja sellest sarja "Selge pilt" teise hooaja viimane saade räägibki. Saatejuht Kadi Jaanisoo-Kuld, režissöör Märten Vaher, toimetaja Priit Rajalo, produtsent Egle Beek.(n)

programme.title: Windsori kuningakoda
programme.desc: Walesi printsessi Diana lugu räägib sellest, kuidas 19-aastasest tüdrukust saab üleilmne kuulsus, kelle tohutust isiklikust populaarsusest ja traagilisest surmast kujuneb Windsoritele suurim proovikivi pärast Edward VIII troonist loobumist. Mõned päevad pärast Diana surmaga lõppenud autoõnnetust lööb troon pisut kõikuma, kuid kuninganna väikesest žestist ja lühikesest kõnest Diana kiituseks piisab rahva rahustamiseks. Diana on siiski raputanud Windsori kuningakoja alustugesid ja jätnud kestva pärandi kahe poja näol.(n)

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Sue jälgib elurikkust oma laagris. Andy Bassich ja Denise Becker tegelevad Yukoni jõe ääres ehitustööga. Ricko DeWilde õpetab oma lastele loodusvarade hoidmist. Hailstone'ide pere kasvab.(n)

programme.title: Iluuisutamise juunioride MM Tallinnas
programme.desc: Kõige suurema konkurentsiga alal läheb kõrget kohta püüdma valitsev Eesti meister Niina Petrõkina. Tal on seljataga debüüdid täiskasvanute tiitlivõistlustel ja kirjas suurepärase vabakavaga sõidetud 8. koht koduselt EM-ilt ning 16. koht Prantsusmaal peetud MM-ilt, kus nii puhtaid sõite ei õnnestunud näidata. Lühikava 24 paremat pääsevad vabakavale ja kolm paremat teenivad väikse medali. 2007. aastal oli Elena Glebova medali võitmisele väga lähedal, kui lõpetas juunioride MM-il lühikava neljanda kohaga. Väiksest pronksist jäi tal siis lühikavas puudu vaid 0,45 punkti. Otseülekande režissöör on Margit Rand, reporter Aet Süvari ning kommentaatorid Anu Säärits ja Liina-Grete Lilender.(n)

programme.title: Õed
Tottori! Sommeren vi var alene
programme.desc: Õed, 9-aastane Vega ja 5-aastane Billie, lähevad isaga Norra metsadesse telkima. Oodatud retk on täis vahvaid seiklusi ja õnnelikke hetki, kuni isa kaljulõhesse kukub ning jala välja väänab. Liikumisvõimetuna saadab ta Vega ja Billie abi järele. Tüdrukud eksivad küll alguses ära, kuid nii mõnedki müstilised vahejuhtumid aitavad neil ülesandega toime tulla. Nad astuvad vastu hirmudele, avastavad oma supervõimed ja omavahelise jõu.(n)

programme.title: Iluuisutamise juunioride MM Tallinnas
programme.desc: Kuidas läheb kodujääl Mihhail Selevkol ja Arlet Levandil? Mihhail kruvis veebruaris Hollandis toimunud turniiril kahe kava summas Eesti rekordi 241 punkti peale, Arlet viis sügisel Soomes toimunud võistlusel oma rekordi 222 punktini. Mullu jäi pandeemia tõttu juunioride MM Hiinas ära. Üle-eelmisel aastal võisteldi Tallinnas ja siis sai Mihhaili vanem vend Aleksandr Selevko üheksanda koha. Lühikava järel oli ta seejuures koguni neljas. Favoriidid on Jaapani ja USA koondislased. Tänavu olümpial pronksi saanud ja maailmameistriks tulnud jaapanlase Shoma Uno tähelend algas 2015. aastal just Tallinnast juunioride MM-ilt. Otseülekande režissöör on Margit Rand, reporter Aet Süvari ning kommentaatorid Anu Säärits ja Liina-Grete Lilender.(n)

programme.title: Minu pere
Dutch Art and Dutch Courage
programme.desc: Susan läheb bossiga ärireisile. Michaelil on mured ülikooli astumisel.(n)

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: When a heist goes south and ends in blood, Jimmy takes his adoptive brother Eli and goes on the run from a vengeful criminal. The brothers stumble into more trouble when young Jimmy uses a mysterious weapon to save his brother, attracting the attention of both the FBI and otherworldly figures.

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: When Thomas wakes up in the lift, the only thing he can remember is his first name. When the lift's doors open, Thomas finds himself surrounded by kids who welcome him to the Glade, a large maze enclosed by stone walls, and just like Thomas, the Gladers don't know why or how they got to the Glade, and they all must escape the deadly-creatures-infested place.

programme.title: Hector And The Search For Happiness
programme.desc: Hector is an eccentric psychiatrist who has a fundamental problem: he cannot make his patients feel better or happier. He decides to embark on a journey around the world to try to understand the mysterious thing called happiness.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: When a heist goes south and ends in blood, Jimmy takes his adoptive brother Eli and goes on the run from a vengeful criminal. The brothers stumble into more trouble when young Jimmy uses a mysterious weapon to save his brother, attracting the attention of both the FBI and otherworldly figures.

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: A conspiracy to kill the president causes a marksman to return from exile and back to work. He is subjected to betrayal, and decides to find out who the real killer is and the reason he's after him.

programme.title: Welcome to the Punch
programme.desc: Former criminal Jacob Sternwood has to return to London when his son gets involved in a heist gone wrong, giving his nemesis detective Max Lewinsky the chance to finally take him down.

programme.title: Broken City
programme.desc: In a broken city full of injustice and corruption, when an ex-cop is betrayed, he seeks to exact revenge on the city's most notorious public figure, Nicholas Hostetler, in an attempt to get his salvation.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: The film is based on SEAL Team 10's failed mission: Operation Red Wings on June 28, 2005 where Four SEAL members are assigned to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shahd.

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and his fellow Gladers try to regain their lives again after escaping from the maze, but find that life outside the maze is a desolate waste land full of blood-thirsty zombies. At the same time they're trying to find clues to guide them to the organization behind the maze.

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: A conspiracy to kill the president causes a marksman to return from exile and back to work. He is subjected to betrayal, and decides to find out who the real killer is and the reason he's after him.

programme.title: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
programme.desc: Carmen is kidnapped in a virtual reality game designed by the children's new enemy (Playmaker), and it is up to (Johnny) to rescue his sister (Carmen) and save the world.

programme.title: The Lego Ninjago Movie
programme.desc: The film follows six young ninjas who live a double life, as they are warriors who defend their city from evil forces by night while by day they're ordinary teens dealing with their biggest enemy: high school.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: Following a successful police crackdown on Gotham's criminal population, an unhinged new criminal appears to challenge both Batman and DA Harvey Dent's campaigns. Chaos and death follow in the Joker's walk as he makes the fight more personal than expected.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: After becoming an outcast following the aftermath of Harvey Dent's death, Bruce Wayne's resumes his role as the caped crusader who must defend Gotham City from Bane's plan of nuclear destruction.

programme.title: Sin City
programme.desc: The tales of 4 different people caught in a world of crime and corruption in Basin City, from a guy looking for his beloved's killer, to a cop who saves a girl from a disfigured murderer, to a man who takes the law into his own hands, to a hitman looking to make some cash.

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Death Cure
programme.desc: As a deadly disease called 'The Flare' spreads while Thomas and his friends need to break into the Last City and survive the WKCD troops as well as attacks by zombies, an arduous mission starts into the deadliest of labyrinths.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: Following a successful police crackdown on Gotham's criminal population, an unhinged new criminal appears to challenge both Batman and DA Harvey Dent's campaigns. Chaos and death follow in the Joker's walk as he makes the fight more personal than expected.(n)

programme.title: The Lego Ninjago Movie
programme.desc: The film follows six young ninjas who live a double life, as they are warriors who defend their city from evil forces by night while by day they're ordinary teens dealing with their biggest enemy: high school.(n)

programme.title: Kalifornia
programme.desc: Brian and Carrie are a journalist duo who go on a cross-country ride to research serial killer murder sites. They share the ride with Early Grayce and his girlfriend, and they later discover that Grayce is a deranged killer himself.(n)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, Martin Terrier (Sean Penn) retires to settle down with his girlfriend, but the organization he works for has other plans for him. Forced to return to Congo, where he had a successful assassination, he finds himself chased by his own his team.(n)

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: In an isolated small-town community, Lilian finds herself the target of a crime lord who has complete control of her hometown. With even the local cops pressuring her to leave, Lilian rebels against the townspeople's passivity and takes a stand against her harasser with the aid of two unlikely allies.(n)

programme.title: Death Wish
programme.desc: In a city ravaged by crime, a trauma surgeon takes justice into his own hands after his wife and daughter are assaulted and the law fails to bring them justice. The double life takes a toll on him as the police start paying attention to the apparent vigilante in their city.(n)

programme.title: My Mom's New Boyfriend
programme.desc: Young FBI agent Henry Durand finds himself assigned to a tough task when he has to monitor his mother's boyfriend, who is an international art thief posing as a consultant.

programme.title: Third Person
programme.desc: Across three cities, three couples struggle through various life hurdles, fighting their way through personal and professional challenges as they connect through one common denominator: love.

programme.title: Before We Go
programme.desc: A street musician crosses paths with a married woman after she misses her train, as he offers to help her they open up to each other and face their hidden fears.

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a prostitute-turned-actress and decides to professionally adopt her, while she in turn is having another affair simultaneously with the writer of the play they're working on.

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: With his career ending due to complications arising from old injuries sustained on the job, CIA agent Evan Lake goes on a revenge quest when he discovers that the man responsible for his injuries, a terrorist by the name of Banir, is still alive.

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: Former CIA operative Peter Devereaux (Pierce Brosnan) returns to work in order to take on a very personal mission. He soon finds himself in the midst of a fierce battle with a former pupil in a scenario involving senior officers in the agency and related to the Russian presidential election.

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: A divorced father and his ex-con brother start a series of bank robberies to keep their family's ranch in West Texas, while two Texas Rangers try to catch them.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: When the gorilla that was once Primatologist Davis Okoye’s friend is affected by an experiment that turns him into a ruthless monster that evades North America destroying everything in his path, Okoye works with a discredited genetic engineer to find an antidote to save the world and his former friend.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: Five years after escaping an attack by what he claims was a 70-foot shark, Jonas Taylor, an expert diver and naval captain, must confront his fears to save those trapped in a sunken submersible.

programme.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
programme.desc: On the way to a family vacation in Florida, Kevin McCallister boards the wrong plane and finds himself alone without his family yet again. As he makes New York his playground using his father's credit card, he stumbles on the recently-escaped Wet Bandits, and has to use his wits to outprank them.(n)

programme.title: Grown Ups 2
programme.desc: Lenny (Adam Sandler) decides to take his family back to his hometown where he grew up with his friends, and throughout the film, Lenny and his friends believe their kids are still children, but they eventually accept the idea that they have grown up and learn from them.(n)

programme.title: Some Kind Of Beautiful
programme.desc: A Cambridge poetry professor gets romantically involved with a student, which makes him re-evaluate the life of excess he has led to this point.(n)

programme.title: The Vow
programme.desc: After a car accident leaves Paige with a severe memory loss, her husband Leo tries to get her to love him again.(n)

programme.title: Two Night Stand
programme.desc: After two people make an online connection that leads to a one-night stand, they wake up to find themselves snowed in after sleeping through a blizzard that put all of Manhattan on ice. They have to extend their first night and turn it into a two-night stand.(n)

programme.title: The Vow

programme.title: Hugo
programme.desc: In 1930's Paris, orphaned Hugo lives in a crowded train station. He enters a new adventure with Isabelle, in an attempt to solve the mystery his father has left behind regarding an automaton.(n)

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a remote town near the edge of the magical land, Tristan promises his beloved that he will search for a fallen star for her, embarking on a journey of magical adventures in the process.(n)

programme.title: Horns
programme.desc: After Ig is accused of raping his girlfriend, he wakes up to find horns sprouting from his forehead. Given the ability to make people confess their sins by the horns, Ig sets to find the real culprit.(n)

programme.title: Alpha
programme.desc: The movie chronicles around a survival story that goes 20 thousand years back, during the last Ice Age.(n)

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: In a mythical world, the personal revenge of the barbarian warrior Conan turns into an epic battle against all of his adversaries and enormous monsters, at the heart of impossible odds, becoming the only hope of saving the great nations of Hyboria from the domination of supernatural evil forces.(n)

programme.title: Grown Ups 2

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.

programme.title: Man of Tai Chi
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves’ directorial debut centers on the spiritual journey of a talented young martial artist whose skills draw him into the world of underground fight clubs.

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry and Rachel meet each other through a mysterious phone call from a woman they've never met, threatening their lives and pushing them into a chain of risky situations by using modern technology and carefully monitoring their movements.

programme.title: Baahubali: The Beginning
programme.desc: After growing up isolated from the world, Shivudu's adventurous nature leads him out of his homeland. His journey leads him to discover his true origins and the bloody dispute that led to him being raised away from his rightful royal place.

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A trained gang performs a bank heist in an organized manner, and a federal agent is assigned to negotiate with them. Another agent is assigned to protect valuable assets inside a bank safe, leading to a series of negotiations from several ends.

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: As a way to prove himself worthy of marrying Angela, James' sister, security guard Ben joins her cop brother on a day long patrol of Atlanta.

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along film.James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along, and try to bust some drug dealing operations in Miami, before Ben’s wedding to James’ sister.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: In 79 A.D., a slave turned gladiator races against time to save his beloved from marrying a corrupt Roman Senator, as Mount Vesuvius erupts in the Roman city of Pompeii.

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: Princess Pei Pei is kidnapped from the Forbidden City, and Chon Wang decides to join the guards to rescue the princess. He teams up with a train robber, and they start a series of adventures together.

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future Chicago setting, people are divided into five distinct factions based on their personalities. Beatrice discovers that she is Divergent, meaning she does not fit into any one faction, and soon uncovers a sinister plot brewing in her seemingly perfect society.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: The Decepticons' leader is looking for a miraculous super stone that gives its holder supernatural strength. The only one able to get to the stone is Sam, a college student, and his friend Mikaela. Will he be able to save the world before the stone falls into the hands of the Decepticons.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Princess Diana, Princess of the Amazon, was trained at Paradise Island to become an invincible warrior. When an American pilot lands on her island and tells her about the outside world, she decides to leave her home in the hope of seeing new cultures and meeting other warriors from Greece. She becomes Wonder Woman and tries to stop ongoing wars while testing her superpowers.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is heading towards Earth, threatening to destroy mankind, NASA sends a team of drillers and geologists, to drill inside the asteroid and blow it from the inside with a warhead.

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: Princess Pei Pei is kidnapped from the Forbidden City, and Chon Wang decides to join the guards to rescue the princess. He teams up with a train robber, and they start a series of adventures together.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is an undercover assassin who falls in love with Jen and he decides to retire and marry her. After several years, he finds huge reward to kill him, which makes him doubt everyone around him ,so he hides at Jen's father, who was also an assassin and he tries to help him.

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future Chicago setting, people are divided into five distinct factions based on their personalities. Beatrice discovers that she is Divergent, meaning she does not fit into any one faction, and soon uncovers a sinister plot brewing in her seemingly perfect society.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: The Decepticons' leader is looking for a miraculous super stone that gives its holder supernatural strength. The only one able to get to the stone is Sam, a college student, and his friend Mikaela. Will he be able to save the world before the stone falls into the hands of the Decepticons.

programme.title: Wonder Woman

When an American pilot lands on her island and tells her about the outside world, she decides to leave her home in the hope of seeing new cultures and meeting other warriors from Greece. She becomes Wonder Woman and tries to stop ongoing wars while testing her superpowers.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in an ancient war between two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Upon discovering his baby photo on a website for missing persons, Nathan discovers that the father and mother he has been living with throughout his youth are not his real parents. He sets out to uncover the truth about his life.

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Chon Wang is the sheriff of Carson City, Nevada, and his father is the Keeper of the Imperial Seal of China. When his father is murdered, Chon asks his friend Roy to go to London with him, with revenge on their minds.

programme.title: Insurgent
programme.desc: Beatrice Prior must go on saving the ones she loves and confront her inner demons to fight against a powerful alliance that is threatening her society.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Sam's intention to leave the Autobots behind in pursuit of a normal life is thwarted as an old Decepticon known as The Fallen rises, forcing Sam and his girlfriend Mikaela to delve into the history of the Transformers on Earth to find a way to defeat The Fallen.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Following the Normandy Landings in the Second World War, the US president assigns a group of U.S. soldiers led by Captain Miller (Tom Hanks) to go behind enemy lines to retrieve a fellow soldier (Matt Damon) who lost his three brothers in action.

programme.title: Hell on the Border
programme.desc: The true story of how Bass Reeves beat the odds and a racist community to become the first black deputy marshal west of the Mississippi River, with a career that made history as he distinguished himself in facing off against the outlaws.

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: A story of how siblings go too far to save one another as a retired master car thief is forced to get back to the industry and reassemble his gang for one dangerous mission, facing an old rivalry with a group of thieves as well as the local police, just to save his brother.

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. He mentions their faulty processes to his best friend, Eddie, and unexpectedly becomes part of an eleven million dollar heist. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Chon Wang is the sheriff of Carson City, Nevada, and his father is the Keeper of the Imperial Seal of China. When his father is murdered, Chon asks his friend Roy to go to London with him, with revenge on their minds.

programme.title: Insurgent
programme.desc: Beatrice Prior must go on saving the ones she loves and confront her inner demons to fight against a powerful alliance that is threatening her society.(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Sam's intention to leave the Autobots behind in pursuit of a normal life is thwarted as an old Decepticon known as The Fallen rises, forcing Sam and his girlfriend Mikaela to delve into the history of the Transformers on Earth to find a way to defeat The Fallen.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Japanese animated high-tech film, a special ops human-cyborg hybrid called The Major leads Section 9, which is an elite task force team. Devoted to stopping the most dangerous criminals and extremists, Section 9 is faced with an enemy whose singular goal is to wipe out Hanka Robotic's advancements in cyber technology.(n)

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: This action epic brings to life the real tale of 47 samurai warriors who in 18th century Japan set out on a quest to avenge the death of their master, killed by a treacherous overlord who banished them from their homeland.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: Tris and Four make the hard decision to leave their home behind in an attempt to find a way to save Chicago from turmoil. However, they end up being taken to a city of hidden secrets where they end up learning the backstory of how their world became what it is.(n)

programme.title: Transformers : Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The Autobots and Decepticons discover a space ship on the moon that contains secrets that can lead to war of the worlds. Events unfold as both sides attempt to capture the space ship.(n)

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: Charlie (Wahlberg), Stella (Theron) and their carefully selected team, plan a gold bar heist against their former ally-turned-enemy, Steve.(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: Welcome to Sudden Death
programme.desc: As he accompanies his kids to a basketball match, Jesse, the security guard who was once a special forces officer, is in a predicament when he finds out about a group of technophile extremists who are holding a coach and his daughter captive inside the arena.(n)

programme.title: Echo Boomers
programme.desc: In an attempt to get back at the unfair economy and live the life they've always wanted, a group of college graduates goes on a destructive spree as they rob Chicago's richest while sending a message to the world.(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Five years after the first part, the wanted criminal (Riddick) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself facing the invasion of an empire called Necromongers, the army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.(n)

programme.title: Overboard
programme.desc: A spoiled, wealthy yacht owner is thrown overboard and loses his memory, when a single working mother decides to take advantage of the situation and tries to convince him that they are married.

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Gina decides to open her own hairdresser's shop in Atlanta, which starts to attract customers who seem to care more about talking than getting their hair done.

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguist, Louise Banks, and a theoretical physicist, Ian Donnelly are asked by US Army Colonel Weber to join a team to find out why twelve extraterrestrial spacecrafts have appeared across the Earth. Banks makes contact with two seven-limped aliens and starts to learn their language of complicated circular symbols. As mankind swings on the verge of global war, Banks and the team race against time for answers which if misinterpreted, could threaten the future of humanity.

programme.title: Amos & Andrew
programme.desc: When wealthy black author Andrew is mistaken for a burglar in his own vacation house, the local police chief recruits petty crook Amos to help with the cover-up. But soon Andrew and Amos become targeted by the police, and they have to work together to make it out alive.

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: The true story of boxer James Braddock, who was a boxing champion in the 1930s until he began to suffer injuries and broke his left hand and became poor in a period where only the rich survive, how will he support himself, wife and three children with a broken hand in the winter.

programme.title: The Sun Is Also a Star

programme.title: Nicholas Nickleby

They try to convince her to leave but she refuses while turning their beautiful dream into a nightmare.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: This picture is a drama about the founding of the popular social network website “Facebook”. After breaking up with his girlfriend, Mark has the idea to create a website where Harvard students can rate the attractiveness of females at the school. Eventually, he launches a website with his friend Eduardo that allows people to look up their friends without violating privacy.

programme.title: King of California

programme.title: The Wonderful: Stories From The Space Station
Adventures of a Mathematician
programme.desc: Based on a true story; in the 1930s, Stan Ulam, a Polish-born mathematician, travels to the United States, where he joins the Manhattan Project and helps create the first computer.

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.

programme.title: Just What the Doctor Ordered
programme.desc: When a fire breaks out in the prison for the mentally ill, Dr. Albert Beck runs away and takes a shelter in an abandoned house, after which he's surprised to find that his hideout is the new house of a woman and her 18-year-old daughter.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.

programme.title: Love Locks
programme.desc: In the City of Light, Lindsey fell in love with Jack while studying at the Sorbonne, a romance that quickly ended when she went back to the US. Twenty years later, Lindsey returns to Paris with her daughter, only to run into Jack who quickly catches feelings for her all over again.

programme.title: Limbo
programme.desc: As the aspiring young musician Omar is separated from his Syrian family, he ends up on a remote Scottish island, where he awaits a decision on his asylum claim.

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.

programme.title: Crawl
programme.desc: When a hurricane strikes her Florida town, Haley ignores the evacuation orders to search for her missing father. After she finds him seriously injured, they become trapped in their house because of a massive flood. They try to escape, but discover that the rising water level is the least of their worries.

programme.title: Replicas

programme.title: The Iron Mask

programme.title: Mighty Oak

programme.desc: When Kate's fiancé leaves her, she finds herself in a dilemma since their publicized marriage is about to happen, and the issue could threaten her image as a relationship expert. A childhood friend, who harbors a secret crush on her, steps up as a replacement groom to help her save face.

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: Lucy is a lonely worker at the train station,who secretly like Peter, one of the passengers . Lucy saves his life on Christmas, but then he goes into a coma. His family mistakenly thinks Lucy is his fiancée while his younger brother, Jack, suspects it, despite the whole family's admiration for Lucy.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: A new student must find someone to date the most depressing girl in school, in order to take her little sister, who he likes, on a date, who's not allowed to date anyone till her older sister is on a date first.

programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: Silvia Broome, who works as an interpreter for the U.S. government, overhears death threats towards an African president. When she discloses what she heard, her life turns upside down, and she becomes a target. She is then placed under protection of agent Tobin Keller.

programme.title: Sweet Land
programme.desc: Set in a 1920 small Minnesota village; as a German woman arrives for an arranged marriage to a Norwegian immigrant farmer, the young couple has to deal with the rising hostility towards Germans in the aftermath of WWI.

programme.desc: A renowned High Court Judge deals with a personal crisis just as she has to rule on one of the hardest cases of her life. Her ruling is what determines whether an underage leukemia patient can refuse a life-saving blood transfusion for religious reasons or not.

programme.title: The Good Lie
programme.desc: Orphaned by the brutal Civil war in Sudan that began in 1983, these young victims traveled as many as a thousand miles on foot in search of safety. Fifteen years later, a humanitarian effort would bring 3600 lost boys and girls to America.

programme.title: The Perfect Catch
programme.desc: A struggling single mother fights to keep her small-town diner afloat. Brought down by a series of disappointments and abandonments, she finds a sliver of hope in the form of an old boyfriend, Chase, who is a professional baseball player who comes to his childhood home after a career disappointment.

programme.title: The Wedding Planner
programme.desc: A chance encounter between the perpetually-single wedding planner Mary and the pediatrician Steve leads to a spark to be ignited, only for Mary to discover that Steve is engaged to be married, and his bride-to-be is the same woman who just hired her to plan the biggest wedding of her career.

programme.title: The Salesman
programme.desc: As they rehearse for Arthur Miller's Death of a Salesman, Rana and Emad's plans are interrupted by an assault on Rana in their new house. As the traumatized Rana tries to deal with the aftermath, Emad becomes focused on finding the person who hurt his wife.

programme.title: Whip It

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: A professional driver who works in criminal operations, is charged with transporting the daughter of a dangerous Chinese crime lord.

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguist, Louise Banks, and a theoretical physicist, Ian Donnelly are asked by US Army Colonel Weber to join a team to find out why twelve extraterrestrial spacecrafts have appeared across the Earth. Banks makes contact with two seven-limped aliens and starts to learn their language of complicated circular symbols. As mankind swings on the verge of global war, Banks and the team race against time for answers which if misinterpreted, could threaten the future of humanity.

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: Veteran cop John McClane, is charged with investigating a different terrorist crime. The computers of the FBI's Cyber Crime Division were hacked on Independence Day, and his mission is to find and arrest the criminals behind it.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A group known as the "The Organization." hires a professional hit-man who goes by the name of Agent 47, getting him involved in a political conspiracy involving the Interpol and the Russian army. While attempting to escape through Russia and Eastern Europe, he seems to be strangely affected by a mysterious Russian woman.

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: An FBI agent is chasing a gang of professional thieves who leave no trace behind them. He discovers that the gang is not just targeting armed robberies on banks but committing murders as well.

programme.title: S.M.A.R.T. Chase
programme.desc: When he gets ambushed during a mission to transport a precious Chinese antique, a private security agent must fight his way through brutal thugs to reclaim what he has lost; both the antique and his reputation.

programme.title: Killing Gunther
programme.desc: Fed up with Gunther who has earned the title of the world's greatest hitman, a group of professional assassins decides to put an end to his prowess and his life.

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: A professional driver who works in criminal operations, is charged with transporting the daughter of a dangerous Chinese crime lord.

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A group of humans who survived a devastating virus that has struck the planet a decade earlier, are at peace with genetically evolved apes led by Caesar. Proven fragile, peace is broken and a war begins between both sects that will determine who will dominate Earth.

programme.title: First Kill
programme.desc: When a bank robber takes a kid hostage, an agent and the kid’s father try to take him back before it is too late.

programme.title: Salyut-7
programme.desc: In 1985, cosmonauts Vladimir Dzhanibekov and Viktor Savinykh undertake the most challenging mission in space exploration, when they attempt to dock the unmanned Soviet space station Salyut 7.(n)

programme.title: Gotti
programme.desc: A closer look at the crime world of the Gotti family, as John Gotti Jr. is struggling in his relationship with his father on a personal level, as well as taking over the position of his father as head of the Gambino criminal organization that was founded by his father a long time ago.(n)

programme.title: Between Worlds
programme.desc: The trucker Joe finds himself facing an unusual situation after he is recruited to help a spiritually-gifted mother save her comatose daughter, Billie. But Billie is possessed by the spirit of Joe's late wife, who is not about to relinquish her hold on Billie as she still has business to attend to.(n)

programme.title: The Hatton Garden Job
programme.desc: The story follows four elderly men's daring attempt to rob the Hatton Garden Company in 2015, which owns a huge underground safe deposit with a value of up to £200 million.(n)

programme.title: Arsenal
programme.desc: Mikey (Johnathon Schaech) and JP (Adrian Grenier) grew up together and only had each other to rely on. As adults, JP became a successful owner of a construction company, while Mikey became a small-time mobster. After mikey gets abducted by ruthless crime boss Eddie King (Nicolas Cage), and is held for ransom, JP turns to their old friend Detective Sal (John Cusack) for help.(n)

programme.title: Upgrade
programme.desc: In the wake of a devastating attack, a technophobe is forced to let go of his distrust of technology when he is offered a chip implant that enables him to regain the ability to walk. He then sets to identify the people behind the attack that claimed his wife's life and left him in that predicament.(n)

programme.title: Solis
programme.desc: When Troy Holloway is trapped in a drifting escape pod headed to the sun, he realizes that the problem he's in is much bigger than he thought, as the oxygen is rapidly running out, his chances of survival are quickly declining.(n)

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: A story of how siblings go too far to save one another as a retired master car thief is forced to get back to the industry and reassemble his gang for one dangerous mission, facing an old rivalry with a group of thieves as well as the local police, just to save his brother.(n)

programme.desc: Former army ranger Cameron is newly paroled after being imprisoned for manslaughter. When his prison transport plane is seized by his fellow inmates, he has to pretend to be on their side as he searches for a way to stop them.(n)

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: In the fifth Die Hard installment, John McClane is back and off to Russia to rescue his wayward son, Jack, who turns out to be a CIA operative in trouble. Father and son join forces to prevent nuclear disaster.(n)

programme.title: Echoes
programme.desc: A young writer who suffers from sleep paralysis that makes her experience horrifying visions goes to an isolated desert house with her boyfriend seeking peace of mind. But her visions intensify and she finds herself about to uncover a life-threatening secret.

programme.title: Trouble
programme.desc: A comedy-drama that sees two siblings, both in their middle age, face off against each other as each tries to get control of their father's estate.

programme.title: Big Mamma's House 2
programme.desc: FBI agent Malcolm Turner once again dons the disguise of an overweight elderly woman as he goes undercover as a nanny to the children of the suspected designer of a computer worm that creates a backdoor to critical government intelligence files.

programme.title: Colossal
programme.desc: A jobless girl, Gloria, is prompted to leave her life in New York and head back to her hometown. As the news reports announce the emergence of a colossal creature threatening to unleash terrors on the city of Seoul, Gloria gradually realizes that she's mysteriously connected to the creature.

programme.title: A Dark Place
programme.desc: When a backwoods town is rocked by the disappearance of a local boy whose body is then found in the river, the local garbage truck driver becomes obsessed with finding the truth behind his death, whatever the cost may be.

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: When Frank takes in his niece Mary, he tries to give her a normal childhood away from the pressure that comes from being a mathematical genius like her mother. But Frank's mother stands in the way, drawing Frank into a legal battle over Mary's custody.

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: When Dodge's wife leaves him after the news of an asteroid nearing Earth break out, he decides that he wants to spend his final days trying to reunite with his high school sweetheart. Along for the ride is his neighbor Penny that accompanies him on a journey that will change both their lives.
